Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian:::

::Starscream hears Drillbit's transmission::
Starscream: Alright guys, we have to find the new base. look for a collapsed 
tunnel.
::They look for awhile and eventually find it::
Obsidian: Alright, heres the stumper, how do we dig through? Im made for the 
sky.
Starscream: My Octopus mode wouldnt help.
Bludgeon: Hey guys! Im a Rhino with tank treads! I could get us throguh here 
in no time!
::Bludgeon is about to set to work digging, but then then Drillbits new 
transmission comes in::
Starscream: Pull out Bludgeon. New orders, we wait for coordinates of a new 
entrance.
::Bludgeon pulls out of the hole and they all wait.

--part1_2f.fbdce21.2797a212_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
